content:
On mobile, we try to put the crate version in the middle of the topbar, but only at the main page of a crate:

image.png

See https://doc.rust-lang.org/nightly/std/index.html vs https://doc.rust-lang.org/nightly/std/vec/index.html.

For docs.rs crates this usually fits fine, but for stdlib nightly docs it's almost always too big. I propose to remove this from the topbar on stdlib docs.
That seems reasonable, the standard library is always today anyway
